channel.title: [HELP] DeltaScape Help [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello moparscape,
I am currently working on a server based on the source of Deltascape.
I am making it a full out pk server and as you know deltascape are different coding from other servers.
I currently want to change the home place, home teleport place, starting levels, starting destination and how to move objects to other places
Please help me, If your the one to help :) You get free admin on our server
I will run the server as long as I can.
Thanks Alot,
Jamie14

item.title: [HELP] DeltaScape Help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Jamie14 Jamie14
item.description:
@Jamie14 wrote:

I know I’ve did that but I dont seem to find many tutorials on deltascape that’s why I posted.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] DeltaScape Help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Before you ask questions, it is required that you search for tutorials and resources yourself. This is not a spoon fed community. tutorials and the search bar should hold results for all of your questions, as I’ve seen them posted before on here.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] DeltaScape Help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Jamie14 Jamie14
item.description:
@Jamie14 wrote:

Ok all I need now is to change the starting levels, home teleport X and Y, Moving objects to the new home and to make all new players quests finished so they don’t need to do them!

PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] DeltaScape Help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @o0000_o_o_o0 o0000 o o o0
item.description:
@o0000_o_o_o0 wrote:

  • Changing starting area

  1. go to player.java in ur server files, search for initial x and y coordinates of the player, then you see some number below, like this : 1234/ 1234;
    That is your X coordinates, change them to whatever you like, it is hard with DeltaScape source since u cant do ::mypos, but if you want it in Edge, it should look like this

     // initial x and y coordinates of the player
 heightLevel = 0;
 // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
 teleportToX = 3094; // 3094;
 teleportToY = 3490; // 3490;

No problem, i didnt leech this anywhere, i just looked in my file cuz my starter area is in edge ^^

Read full topic
